content:
Kostchtchie (The Deathless Frost) [CE]

Edicts Avenge all slights three times over, kill all witches
Anathema Make a deal with Baba Yaga or her children, defer to or obey a woman
Follower Alignments NE, CE

Devotee Benefits

Divine Ability Strength or Constitution
Divine Font harm
Divine Skill Athletics
Favored Weapon warhammer
Domains cold, destruction, might, zeal
Cleric Spells 1st: chilling spray, 2nd: enlarge, 5th: cone of cold
name: Kostchtchie
